com.plexus.sam.audio
Class PlaylistSet

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.audio.PlaylistSet

public class PlaylistSet
extends java.lang.Object

This is a container class that bundles the playlists, and has methods for loading and saving, analogeous to repository saving the songs and songgroups.

Author:
plexus
